get libraries & load data
```{r setup, collapse=TRUE, warning=FALSE}
require(psych)

#load data
d1 = read.csv('/Users/kelly/cueexp/data/q_demo_data/data_controls_190311.csv')

```

#pairs plots 1

```{r pairs plot1, collapse=TRUE, warning=FALSE}

dp = with(d1, data.frame(putamen_fa,putamen_md,age,dwimotion,BIS))
          
pairs.panels(dp)

```
